name: Trading Post
description: A strategic trading post facilitates commerce between different regions and cultures, offering diverse goods and information. The constant flow of traders creates opportunities for profit and espionage, while the valuable goods make it a target for bandits and raiders.
atmosphere: Wooden buildings house diverse merchants trading goods from distant regions. Multiple languages blend in constant haggling while exotic spices and foreign goods fill the air. Caravans arrive and depart regularly as guards watch valuable cargo. Trade routes converge at this commercial crossroads.
